javax.jaxtx
Interface UserTransactionFactory

public interface UserTransactionFactory

The UserTransactionFactory is used to obtain a handle on a specific type of transaction model implementation. So, for example, it would be possible to use this to obtain a reference to a UserTransaction that implemented JTA style transactions, or one which implemented BTP type transactions.

Method Summary
 org.w3c.dom.Document configuration()
          Returns parse-able information about the protocol this coordinator implements.
 UserTransaction[] getAllTransactionTypes()
          Get all UserTransactions that this factory knows about.

          Get the transaction service implementation that is currently associated with the invoking thread (if any).

Method Detail

configuration

public org.w3c.dom.Document configuration()
                                   throws SystemException
Returns parse-able information about the protocol this coordinator implements.
Returns:
the XML configuration file, or null if there is not one.
Throws:
SystemException - Thrown if any error occurs.

getTransactionType

public UserTransaction getTransactionType(org.w3c.dom.Document conf)
                                   throws NoSuchServiceException,
                                          SystemException
Get a UserTransaction that corresponds to the transaction type and configuration specified. The factory can use the XML information in any way it deems necessary to find the type of transaction implementation requested. This search algorithm may be specified within the XML document itself.
Parameters:
org.w3c.dom.Document - conf The configuration information that specifies the type of transaction and other implementation specific data.
Returns:
a handle to a specific transaction implementation.
Throws:
NoSuchServiceException - Thrown if no UserTransaction corresponding to the type required can be found.
SystemException - Thrown if any other error occurs.

getAllTransactionTypes

public UserTransaction[] getAllTransactionTypes()
                                         throws InvalidSecurityOptionException,
                                                SystemException
Get all UserTransactions that this factory knows about. Some implementation specific search algorithm may be used.
Returns:
a handle to all transaction implementations.
Throws:
InvalidSecurityOptionException - Thrown if the invoking thread is not allowed access to this information.
SystemException - Thrown if any other error occurs.

getCurrentTransactionType

public UserTransaction getCurrentTransactionType()
                                          throws SystemException
Get the transaction service implementation that is currently associated with the invoking thread (if any).
Returns:
the UserTransaction implementation currently associated with this thread, or null if there is no association.
Throws:
SystemException - Thrown if any error occurs.
